title: View: India needs the U.S. in order to realize its tech ambitions - Economic Times
content: View: India needs the U.S. in order to realize its tech ambitions  Economic Times
description: The U.S. holds the key to Indias technology future. Chinas ZTE Corp. and Huawei Technologies Inc. can attest to the havoc that stiff policies in Washington can wreak on their business. Having been caught for various sanctions-related infractions, both companies were cut off from being able to buy not only U.S. chips, but components made using American technology.
